prompts.commit_message: Please provide a commit message that starts with one of the following keywords: feat, fix, docs, refactor, test, or chore, followed by a concise description.
prompts.documentation: Ensure all new code includes inline documentation and module/class/function docstrings. Explain any non-obvious logic.
prompts.tests: Have you written tests for your new features or bug fixes? Make sure you add tests under the tests/ directory and run them.
prompts.branch_naming: When creating a new branch, please use the format: feature/<description>, bugfix/<description>, or hotfix/<description>.
